programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shinpei Mayama, the Rat Clan, Union Mama... the all-stars of assassination, from all over the world, suddenly come after Lupin. They're players in a new game started by the executives of Marco Polo: Happy Deathday.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 5/15/22: Hunter Greene pitches 7 and 1/3 innings without a single hit, but a crucial RBI forceout for the Pirates by Ke'Bryan Hayes in the bottom of the 8th inning gives the Pirates their one and only run leading them to an unusual 1-0 win over the Reds.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 5/24/22: The Mets and Giants engage in an epic back-and-forth battle for the ages, however the Mets' seven run 8th inning is not enough to keep the Giants away from the win, with Brandon Crawford walking it off with an RBI single in the 9th inning.

programme.title: Great Games: All-Star

programme.title: Prime 9

programme.title: This Week in Baseball

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: MST3K: Bride Of The Monster

programme.title: MST3K Shorts

programme.desc: The final chapter of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Black wants to leave his fiance Justine to be with a woman named Star. But he's about to find out that Star is actually a man. Then, Jay has to reveal to Brittany the shocking secret that he slept with her sister Donna.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Kim says her husband of 7 years became possessive, lazy and demanding. She got her revenge by sleeping with his father, Daniel! Later Chris is a player who's dating 2 women at the same time and they are not happy about it!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Rob hates his brother, Steve, and can't wait to tell him that he's sleeping with his fiancee and she's going home with him! Next Meg will make it clear to her boyfriend that she is serious about her unusual fantasy of having sex with clowns!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Food flies when Chauncey tells Paula that he has been sleeping with the neighbor! Then, Julia has been a prostitute for 10 years and her boyfriend, Eddie, has never done anything to help her. Next, Little people, Eric and his family are back!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Niki is here to beg her sister, Margerie, to leave her cheating husband, Chris. But Margerie claims to still love him even though he's still seeing Rhonda. However, Rhonda tells Chris she's fed up with his lying and she won't be fooled!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: James is engaged to Amanda, and now he confesses that he's cheating with Melanie. Next Jewel competes for her mistress' love when "Christa," a transsexual who is also smitten "Mistress Shock," proclaims that she wants the dominatrix for herself.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Lisa's husband, Mickey, moved his mistress into their house 3 months ago! Then LaTasha's boyfriend, Maurice, has been cheating with Day Day! Maurice says it's over with Day Day, but much to his surprise, LaTasha won't take him back!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Daphne is sleeping with her daughter's boyfriend, G-Quan! He vows that he loves Wendy. But G-Quan has one final confession. Next Jenna says her husband's constant nagging drove her into the arms of her best friend.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Chris is here today to tell his girlfriend, Chrissy, what he's really into. Next we meet Mistress Tara, the dominatrix who caters to Chris' fantasy. We'll watch him pretend to be a dog.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Emotional Jamie is torn between her husband and her live-in boyfriend. She says she loves them both and is not even sure whose baby she is carrying! Next Dana and Steve are here to convince their daughter that she cannot marry her cousin!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Whilst in jail, Scooter asked his dad, Richard, if his wife Keri and their child could move in with him, but he didn't expect Keri and Richard to fall in love!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Stephanie takes a lie-detector test to prove that she is faithful to her boyfriend; an engaged couple accuse each other of cheating; Maurice wants to prove to his girlfriend that he is loyal.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Cliff quiere que Anna, la mejor amiga de su novia, los deje en paz. Después, el marido de Kelly le ruega que lo acepte de regreso, pero Kelly no quiere porque ya está con el hermano de su marido.

programme.title: El show de Jerry Springer
programme.desc: Gail quiere más emociones en su vida, por lo que ha estado acostándose con el novio de su mejor amiga. Después, Dave se entera de que su novia de los últimos 3 años tiene una aventura y está dispuesto a todo para recuperarla, incluso ponerse un sostén.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy en MAURY, tenemos a madres y padres muy enfadados en negación. ¡Estos hombres juran que es imposible que sean los padres de los hijos de estas mujeres! Pero, ¿y si tienen razón? ¿Qué respuestas darán los resultados de ADN?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los invitados del episodio de hoy de MAURY tienen secretos que revelar, pero ¿se arrepentirán de contarlos? Hay relaciones en peligro. Puede que haya corazones rotos. ¿Podrán estas parejas sobrevivir a los secretos que amenazan con separarlos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, en MAURY, terminó la espera. Finalmente mostramos los resultados emocionantes de las pruebas de paternidad de ayer. Además, las nuevas parejas están cruzando los dedos para recibir las respuestas que quieren.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy, Marisol regresa por 12º vez para hacer la prueba de su 15º hombre. Luego, Dalyna vino a demostrar que Johnny Mack es el padre de su hijo. Él dice que es imposible porque le parece que el bebé es "demasiado feo" para ser suyo.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Rhonda está segura de que John es el padre de su hijo. ¡Incluso la mamá de John está de acuerdo con ella! Después, Kim y Heather solían ser amigas, pero eso fue antes de que Rick la dejara por Heather. Sin embargo, Kim está segura de que Rick es el padre.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Hoy en MAURY, te pondremos al día con algunos de nuestros invitados más emocionantes. Los resultados de paternidad asombraron a todo el mundo. ¿Qué pasó después de revelar las respuestas y que estos invitados retomaron sus vidas?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Los huéspedes de MAURY han estado ocultando secretos horribles de sus seres queridos y eso les está desgarrando por dentro. ¡Están listos para confesar, incluso si eso les hace perder sus relaciones! ¿Se quedarán o se irán sus seres queridos?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Centavia sospecha que su novio Richard la engaña con Kheisha, la niñera. Después, Kristy le revelará 2 secretos a su novio Matt que podrían terminar su relación. ¡Descubre estos secretos impactantes hoy!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: En el episodio de hoy de MAURY, estos hombres dicen que saben que la prueba de paternidad demostrará lo que siempre han sabido: que no son padres de los hijos de las mujeres que los trajeron aquí. ¡Ellas van a demostrar que están equivocados!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¡Estas mujeres han venido con preguntas urgentes! Kendra quiere que su esposo Richard admita que es el padre de su hijo Y del hijo de su amante! ¡Jevon y su familia no creen que él sea el padre del hijo de Jazmine! ¡Solo MAURY tiene las respuestas!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Grace, la madre de Eddie, no los va a dejar vivir con ella a menos que Kay Kay pueda demostrar que su hijo, Eddie, es el padre de su nieto. Después, Troy niega ser el padre de los cinco hijos de Vanessa.

programme.title: El show de Maury

programme.title: Acorralada

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Finally reunited and returned to their proper bodies, the Straw Hats fall in line as Luffy and Law lead the charge to settle the score with Caesar – and save the children!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, Chopper races through the compound in search of the drugged children, and Tashigi's men make the ultimate sacrifice!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy races toward Caesar in the hopes of delivering a beating, Sanji saves a damsel in distress, and Chopper tries to prevent the children from eating the drugged candy!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji and Vergo slug it out in a cloud of toxic gas, Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar's reign of terror to a brutal end!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo goes into action in order to protect his criminal operation! Caesar slips away from Luffy leaving him to face off with the frigid Monet, and the rest of the crew face down a menacing dragon!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar's madness!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Captain Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: It's Zoro vs. Monet in a duel to the death - or is it? Tashigi comes to lend a hand, and she'll need to bring her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness! Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper, Nami, and Robin watch in horror as Mocha makes a heartbreaking sacrifice in a courageous attempt to save the lives of her friends!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown

programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathaleen travel to a remote island in the Canadian Province of British Columbia to catch sight of the rare “Spirit Bear,” an all-white Black Bear. Kathaleen also takes a behind the scenes tour of a floating lodge.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack takes off on a very special egg hunt, looking for creatures big and small that hatch from eggs! Crocodiles, bald eagles, sea turtles, ostriches, penguins, and more!

programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he heads to Pigeon Forge, Tennessee for an All-American Bald Eagle adventure with the American Eagle Foundation at Dollywood!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Zootastic Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack for a globetrotting adventure as he counts down seven zoo-tastic adventures from the Australia Zoo to his home base, the Columbus Zoo! See which zoo is number one on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a weird and wonderful countdown celebrating some of the most unique animals on Earth. Pink River Dolphins, Emus, Sichuan Takin, Okapi, Gerenuk, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen travel to Winnipeg to experience the animals of Canada. At Oak Hammock Marsh, Jack visits a restored natural habitat that functions as a major stop for migratory birds.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack and Suzi are stunned to see the Great Migration in action as animals cross the Mara River into Tanzania's Serengeti National Park.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack travels to a special animal rescue center in the jungles of Costa Rica, and encounters creatures around every corner. Caiman, Toucan, Iguanas, Howler Monkeys and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi head deep into South Africa's Addo National Park to learn more about its famous Elephant population, and the rest of the Big Seven that call Addo home.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Loango National Park in Gabon is often called Africa's Last Eden. Come along with Jack and his family as they explore the untouched wilderness, encountering Forest Elephants, Forest Buffalo, an injured Sea Turtle and the wildest beach on the planet!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and Sue as they head to the southern tip of Chile to explore the untamed region of Patagonia! The land beneath the towering Andes Mountains is home to Condors, Guanacos, and some of the most beautiful Glaciers in the world.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is heading to his home state of Tennessee! He meets a one-of-a-kind farm animal living life to the fullest with a prosthetic leg, and a dedicated caregiver who's helping loads of native species get a second chance.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: On a camel trek in Israel, Jack learns first hand about the animal's unique physiology and important contribution to early trade. Later, Jack visits the International Camel Center.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: It's a Colorful Life
programme.desc: Wild animals flaunt their colors for all sorts of reasons: to send a warning, to attract a mate and sometimes, it’s just something they ate! Today, Jack is counting down seven amazing animals that aren’t shy about showing their true colors.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: At Home on the Range
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack saddles up for a farm fresh countdown! Donkeys, musk ox, camels, and all sorts of barnyard fun is in store as Jack travels to ranches and farms from North and South America to the Middle East.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: While in Barro Colorado, a dense forested island in Panama, Jack goes in search of a Harpy the world's largest eagle. The island is home to the famed Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute.

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Spicy pork goulash; roasted peppers stuffed with chili, tomatoes and fresh herbs.

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie turns his attention to furred game; most people think nothing of eating a chicken, but not rabbit.

programme.title: Jamie at Home

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Moroccan bream; couscous salad; pomegranate and harissa; British burgers; shred salad; pickles and things.

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie makes jerk pork, grilled corn and crunchy tortilla salad, minestrone, poached chicken and salsa verde.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: Thai-style crispy sea bass; veggie tray bake; sweet chicken surprise; and pineapple carpaccio, a tropical dessert made in minutes.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: Mustardy beef that uses only five ingredients; baked saffron rice; steamed salmon nicoise; plum tarte tatin.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver presents the ultimate set of go-to recipes for quick and easy-to-remember cooking. If you think you haven't got time to cook - think again.(30min)

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: Jamie creates chickpea and chard pork, egg fried rice, beef carpaccio with Egyptian spice, and a simple fish pie.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: Lamb kofta flatbreads; a Spanish-inspired broad bean salad with Manchego cheese salad; peanut chicken; peach and almond Alaska.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
programme.desc: Jamie's cooking up his Chicken Noodle Stir-fry an insanely tasty, super-fast sizzling supper... perfect to rustle up at the end of a busy day. Then hearty rustic tomato soup, Pappa Al Pomodoro, that celebrates humble store cupboard ingredients.

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club
programme.desc: Jamie and Jimmy return to their end-of-the-pier caff with blow-out feasts, D.I.Y. gastronomy, celeb friends at the hob and more trips on the road continuing their fight against foodwaste.

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals

programme.desc: Jamie prepares a delicious feast of wonky summer pasta, herby salad, and pear drop tartlets.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: To the astute detective and forensic specialist, the biggest clues often hide in plain sight, and what seems trivial to some is in reality Critical Evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Drowning deaths often look like accidents and water can destroy the scant clues the killer may have left behind. Investigators must turn to forensic science to solve cases where the victim is found dead in the water.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In Northern California, a fire rages in the middle of the night. A woman's charred body is discovered in the smoldering aftermath.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Poison is an almost invisible form of death, and toxicologists must look for hidden clues in blood and tissue to bring these murders to light.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For the forensic entomologist, the insects that nest in dead bodies are like tiny witnesses to a crime.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson fires are set for their own sake, or to cover a different crime, such as murder. Think fire consumes all vital clues? Think again. Arson investigators can glean important clues from scorched rubble and ignite the unquenchable flames of justice.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Solving crimes may begin with gut intuition, but advanced science provides investigators with irrefutable proof. When criminals go to great lengths to mask their crimes, Investigators must step up the challenge and remain forever …undaunted.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: This show profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts as they work to tell the stories of the young men who went to war (from the French and Indian war to Vietnam) and never came back.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The forces of nature can reduce a body to bones in a matter of weeks. Using a unique combination of art and science, forensic anthropologists give victims a face long after they have been forgotten.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There's never a good reason for murder, but some killers are particularly brutal—choosing their prey at random or with no apparent motive and then cunningly covering their tracks. Even so, telltale clues remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder…at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their capture.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: A taping of Hip Hop Squares inspires Stevie and Joc to make a wager. While in LA, Stevie attempts to reignite a romance with Faith Evans.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie thinks he needs to bless the world with a Stevie J. action figure, but Scrappy thinks he needs a serious reality check! Motivated to make his dream of a music lounge come true, Stevie turns to K. Michelle for advice.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Savannah and Stevie Jr. try to manage Dorian's career. Stevie gets a culture shock when he tries to woo a French beauty. At K. Michelle's suggestion, Stevie meets with a PR exec for tips on how to launch his party venture Sleazy J's!

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie and Scrappy enter the exciting world of semi-pro Wrestling! Will the duo be able to hold their own against the reigning Tag Team Champs? Meanwhile, two women test Stevie and Safaree with a yoga challenge.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie can't seem to explain his vision for Sleazy J's, so he decides to get his message across with a unique invitation to his first ever pop-up party. Stevie takes it upon himself to find Mr. Right for his daughter, Savannah.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie throws the inaugural Sleazy J party, a star-studded event, and invites a special someone to be his date. Meanwhile, he is forced to put his chef's hat on to make a unicorn cake for Eva's fundraiser.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Ja Rule gets Punk'd when Brittney brings home a pretend boyfriend to prove she's not a kid anymore. Jeff and Jordy put their lives on the line when Grandma Debra attempts to teach Grandma Jean how to drive.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: When Ja has a concert in NYC, Jeff turns Brittney's low key night with friends into a raging house party. The grannies use Ja's performance as an excuse to go man hunting.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Jordy goes on his first date with help from Ja and Brittney. After being grounded for slacking off at school, Jeff sneaks out of the house to go to a strip club.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Ja becomes Mr. Mom and quickly learns that a woman's work is never done. Brittney transforms into 'Bri-yonce' in hopes of finding her Jay-Z at a college costume party.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Brittney brings her new boyfriend home for Thanksgiving, and Ja gets more information about their relationship than he bargained for. The grannies compete to see who can bake the best pie.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Brittney, Jeff, and Jordy help Grandma Debra enter the digital dating game when they create an online dating profile. Meanwhile, Ja's attempt to fix Brittney's bathroom quickly goes down the toilet.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: It's summertime at the Simmons House. Rev has just purchased a BMW for Jojo's graduation. Diggy and Russy remind Run that they have made the honor roll at school and wonder if they will get a gift too.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Believing Diggy's fly wardrobe may have something to do with girls being interested in him, Russy raids Diggy's closet. Hearing the boys argue over clothes, Justine decides to get Russy some clothes of his own.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Rev and Justine are both fed up with the boys' rude behavior. Justine decides to bring in a supernanny type person to teach the family the basics in social etiquette.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: When Rev learns that Diggy's play date is actually with two girls he believes that Diggy must have a crush on one of them. He's hoping it's Ja Rule's daughter because they must be rich.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Rev receives guest passes to the Mohegan Sun in Connecticut. Justine doesn't want to go. Rev is proud of Jojo's recent recordings with Blackout and wants to reward him as a fellow rapper.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Since Rev can't remember the last time Diggy and Russy had a sleepover, he requests that they invite their friends over for an unforgettable sleepover that Rev dubs "Camp Rev."

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: While putting together her latest insert of Angela's Rundown, Angela discovers she has way too much content to fit into one sixteen-page insert. She and her crew at work discuss a full magazine.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: When Rev hears that his good friend Kid Rock is coming into town he invites him to stay at the house. Russy hopes that Kid will teach him how to play his guitar.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Justine is babysitting her sister Michelle's eleven-month-old baby, Ameera, for two nights. The boys look forward to helping their mom babysit as long as they don't have to change diapers.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: With their tracks finally mixed and mastered JoJo, Zach and Reggie, aka "Blackout," are ready to hit the streets and find a record deal.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: To keep occupied while going to an engineer tech school in the city, JoJo begins an internship at Phat Farm to learn the family business.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Justine's Brown Sugar jewelry line is up and running. And better yet, the Home Shopping Network is interested in working with her. So it's off to sunny Tampa to put Justine's jewelry on air.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Every family has its pecking order and being the youngest sure has its drawbacks: like getting picked on, which makes Russy the target of his brothers and sisters annoyance.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: It's time for JoJo and his group, Blackout, to hit the studio and begin recording tracks for their record. However, JoJo, Zach and Reggie are discouraged by the list of producers Latchkey Recordings has available to them.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Rev and Justine return from visiting their adopted baby they'll soon be able to call their own. They get the family excited with the news that they will have a new sister living in the house in a few days.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Brittish is determined to give it another shot and throws a "Turkish Tea Party" for the group. Meanwhile, Brandi's time to have another baby is running out, so she and her husband Jason seek the help of a fertility specialist. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Things are getting serious with Draya and her boyfriend Orlando Scandrick, but Jackie's daughter has news that may rock Draya's world. Meanwhile, Brittish's fiancé Lorenzo Gordon gets advice from Jackie's husband, Doug Christie. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Draya confronts her boyfriend about accusations of possible infidelity with Jackie's daughter, Chantel. Jackie's gala event falls apart when almost none of her friends show up and Brittish gets into an altercation with Malaysia. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: With the group still reeling from the effects of Jackie's event, Sundy decides the ladies need a getaway to Palm Springs—but for the good of the group, Brittish is not invited. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: The Palm Springs getaway is anything but relaxing as tensions between Draya and Sundy erupt into full-blown mayhem. And in a tearful confession, Draya tells Jackie her daughter may not be as innocent as she thinks. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Jackie develops a bottle for the cognac brand she hopes to launch. As payback for Palm Springs, Draya hosts all the ladies at an excruciating Mud Run. And Jackie forces a meeting with Draya to clear her daughter's name. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Jackie and Chantel are over the situation with Draya and her boyfriend, but Draya and Orlando aren't done yet-- they confront the ladies in an attempt to put the issue to rest. Jackie invites the group on a trip to France. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: The ladies head to France to launch Jackie's cognac, but divisions in the group threaten to spoil the trip and may be the end of Jackie and Malaysia's friendship. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: While in France, Jackie launches her cognac, Brittish gets a surprise present from her fiancé, Lorenzo, and Sundy's attempt to reconcile Malaysia and Jackie takes a nasty turn that ends up splintering the entire group. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Join us for the most dramatic Reunion Special yet! Things get heated with Sundy and Brandi. Jackie reveals her thoughts about the Orlando/ Draya/ Chantel love triangle and one cast member refuses to share the stage with the girls. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Jackie desperately tries to work her way back into the group's good graces. At Draya's 1st ever fashion show, new girl Mehgan introduces herself; but Draya, Brandi and Malaysia are skeptical since they know she's friends with Jackie. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Jackie shoots her 1st commercial and is overwhelmed by the chaos of directing. Mehgan and new friend Patrice support Jackie's endeavor, but later Mehgan starts calling Patrice "evil". Besties Draya & Malaysia fight for the 1st time. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Malaysia meets Jackie to discuss their issues. Shaunie O'Neal joins the group and learns of the heavy drama. Draya has critical thoughts on Mehgan's performance in Jackie's commercial, which Mehgan hears at the commercial premiere. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
